target: OK, you are booked in Cityroomz as requested, the reference number is A1ZBLCZ3, any further questions?
context: <user> I'd like to find a restaurant that offers Asian Oriental cuisine, in the centre, if possible. <system> Definitely! I have places from cheap to expensive, though my favorite is Yippee Noodle Bar, which is moderately-priced. <user> I would like Yippee. <system> I'd be happy to make a reservation for you. What day/time will you be dining, and how many are in your party? <user> Monday, 19:00, for 6 people. <system> I have successfully reserved a table for your party of 6 at the Yippee Noodle Bar for Monday at 19:00. Your reference number is XSQHK9YG <user> Great, I also need a hotel room if you can help me find something. <system> Sure. We have several places ready to book. Which part of town would you like?<user> The west please. <system> There are 4 in that area do you have a price range or type of hotel you prefer?<user> The hotel doesn't need to include internet. It should be in the same area as the restaurant. <system> I have 5 different options for you. They vary in price range. Did you have a certain price range in mind?<user> The price does not matter. Please make a recommendation and book it for the same group of people and 4 nights starting from the same day. <system>
